jediranger:ArcaneSeer.NAME: Arcane Seer
DESCRIPTIONS: When you play a card with no damage and #yBlock, #yEmpower #b%d the top card of your draw pile.

jediranger:DamageEndOfNextTurnPower.NAME: End of Next Turn Damage
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of next turn, take #b%d damage.

jediranger:DamageEndOfThisTurnPower.NAME: End of Turn Damage
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of this turn, take #b%d damage.

jediranger:CrimsonPrinterPower.NAME: Crimson Printer
DESCRIPTIONS: Shuffle a copy of the first card you play each turn into your draw pile and lose HP equal to its cost.
Shuffle a copy of the first #b%d cards you play each turn into your draw pile and lose HP equal to its cost.
